text: Bereg may refer to: * Bereg (Sokolac), a village in Bosnia and Herzegovina * Bereg County, a historic county of the former Kingdom of Hungary * Bački Breg or Bereg (Croatian), a village in Serbia * A-222 Bereg, a Russian self- propelled 130 mm coastal defence gun == See also == * Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg, an administrative county in Hungary
title: Bereg
